nl.weeaboo.vn.render

Interface IDrawBuffer


  • public interface IDrawBuffer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawCustom(IDrawTransform transform, int argb, IRenderLogic renderLogic)
      Adds a custom render command to the draw buffer.
      void drawQuad(IDrawTransform transform, int argb, ITexture tex, nl.weeaboo.common.Area2D bounds, nl.weeaboo.common.Area2D uv)
      Adds a command to draw a textured rectangle to the draw buffer.
      void drawText(IDrawTransform transform, double dx, double dy, nl.weeaboo.styledtext.layout.ITextLayout textLayout, double visibleGlyphs)
      Adds a command to draw some text to the draw buffer.
      void reset()
      Resets the draw buffer, clearing all stored data.
      void screenshot(IWritableScreenshot ss, boolean clip)
      Schedules a screenshot to be taken during rendering.
      IDrawBuffer subLayerBuffer(short layerZ, nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D layerBounds, double contentDx, double contentDy)
      Returns a new draw buffer that can be used to draw the contents of a sub-layer.

      • screenshot

        void screenshot(IWritableScreenshot ss,
                boolean clip)
        Schedules a screenshot to be taken during rendering.
        Parameters:
        ss - The screenshot object to fill with pixels.
        clip - If true, takes a screenshot of just the current clipped area. Otherwise, takes a screenshot of the entire render area.
